deity_markdown: [Arqueros](/Deities.aspx?ID=645), [Cihua Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=413), [Dammerich](/Deities.aspx?ID=646), [Imbrex](/Deities.aspx?ID=454), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=286), [Kazutal](/Deities.aspx?ID=350), [Keepers of the Hearth](/Deities.aspx?ID=248), [Myr](/Deities.aspx?ID=408), [Sairazul](/Deities.aspx?ID=694), [Soralyon](/Deities.aspx?ID=484), [Talons Of The Godclaw](/Deities.aspx?ID=383), [Trudd](/Deities.aspx?ID=451), [Urazra](/Deities.aspx?ID=499), [Vavaalrav](/Deities.aspx?ID=552), [Xoveron](/Deities.aspx?ID=440)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Stoneskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=312)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 374 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Arqueros](/Deities.aspx?ID=645), [Cihua Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=413), [Dammerich](/Deities.aspx?ID=646), [Imbrex](/Deities.aspx?ID=454), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=286), [Kazutal](/Deities.aspx?ID=350), [Keepers of the Hearth](/Deities.aspx?ID=248), [Myr](/Deities.aspx?ID=408), [Sairazul](/Deities.aspx?ID=694), [Soralyon](/Deities.aspx?ID=484), [Talons Of The Godclaw](/Deities.aspx?ID=383), [Trudd](/Deities.aspx?ID=451), [Urazra](/Deities.aspx?ID=499), [Vavaalrav](/Deities.aspx?ID=552), [Xoveron](/Deities.aspx?ID=440)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 20 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target's skin hardens like stone. It gains resistance 5 to physical damage, except adamantine. Each time the target is hit by a bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing attack, stoneskin's duration decreases by 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The resistance increases to 10.

**Heightened (8th)** The resistance increases to 15.

**Heightened (10th)** The resistance increases to 20.
name: Stoneskin

<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 374 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

[Arqueros](/Deities.aspx?ID=645), [Cihua Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=413), [Dammerich](/Deities.aspx?ID=646), [Imbrex](/Deities.aspx?ID=454), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=286), [Kazutal](/Deities.aspx?ID=350), [Keepers of the Hearth](/Deities.aspx?ID=248), [Myr](/Deities.aspx?ID=408), [Sairazul](/Deities.aspx?ID=694), [Soralyon](/Deities.aspx?ID=484), [Talons Of The Godclaw](/Deities.aspx?ID=383), [Trudd](/Deities.aspx?ID=451), [Urazra](/Deities.aspx?ID=499), [Vavaalrav](/Deities.aspx?ID=552), [Xoveron](/Deities.aspx?ID=440)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Harden a creature's skin into durable stone.
</summary>
summary: Harden a creature's skin into durable stone.
summary_markdown: Harden a creature's skin into durable stone.

It gains resistance 5 to physical damage, except adamantine. Each time the target is hit by a bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing attack, stoneskin's duration decreases by 1 minute. --- Heightened (6th) The resistance increases to 10.
